IS590DV - Data Viz

This is the course website for IS590DV in Spring 2020

  • View On GitHub

Week 4 - Beginning interactivity

This week we will learn about ipywidgets and traitlets and apply them to visualizations in Python.

Downloads

Data:

  • The UFO Sitings Dataset (13Mb) - ufo-scrubbed-geocoded-time-standardized-00.csv
  • Michigan Depth Map (86Mb) - michigan_lld.flt

Optional Reading List

  1. Intro to ipywidgets
  2. Example Widgets Notebooks
  3. VAD Ch. 7: Arrange Tables
  4. FDA, Visualizing distributions: Histograms and density plots
